named-query.name: FileMaster.updateStatusForJobIds
named-query.query: UPDATE FileMaster fm SET fm.fileProcessingStatus = :newStatus WHERE fm.processingJob.id IN :jobIds AND fm.fileProcessingStatus IN :statusesToUpdate

named-query.name: FileMaster.updateStatusIfExpected
named-query.query: UPDATE FileMaster fm SET fm.fileProcessingStatus = :newStatus WHERE fm.id = :id AND fm.fileProcessingStatus = :expectedStatus

named-query.name: FileMaster.findByIdWithJob
named-query.query: SELECT fm FROM FileMaster fm JOIN FETCH fm.processingJob WHERE fm.id = :id

named-query.name: FileMaster.findFileLocationById
named-query.query: SELECT fm.fileLocation FROM FileMaster fm WHERE fm.id = :id
